requirements.name: Blocking Sickor In-Repair Entities
requirements.description: If a driver is marked as sick or a bus is marked as under repair, the system shall prevent their assignment to shifts or routes.

requirements.name: License Plate Length Constraint
requirements.description: The license plate number of a bus shall not exceed 10 characters in length.

requirements.name: Visua lHighlighting of Exceptions
requirements.description: The system shall clearly highlight sick drivers and buses under repair in the daily overview.

requirements.name: Route Number Upper Limit
requirements.description: A bus route number shall not exceed 9999.

requirements.name: Advance Planning Window
requirements.description: The system shall support bus and driver schedule planning up to one year in advance.

requirements.name: FlexibleShiftAssignment
requirements.description: The system shall allow unrestricted and potentially overlapping driver shift assignments within a day.

requirements.name: Daily Route Exclusivity for Buses
requirements.description: Each bus shall serve at most one route per day.

requirements.name: Immutable Entity Records
requirements.description: The system shall not allow updates to driver or bus records—only addition and deletion operations are permitted.

requirements.name: Mark Driver as Sick
requirements.description: The system shall allow marking a driver as on sick leave, disabling scheduling.

requirements.name: Add Driver
requirements.description: The system shall allow city staff to add a new driver by entering the driver’s name.

requirements.name: Prevent Assignment of Inoperative Bus
requirements.description: The system shall prevent buses marked as in repair from being assigned to routes.

requirements.name: Assign Bus to Route
requirements.description: The system shall allow buses to be assigned to specific routes up to one year in advance.

requirements.name: Generate Daily Overview
requirements.description: The system shall provide a daily overview of route assignments, buses, shifts, and drivers.
